system:
note description: "[ Widget that contains other widgets. Base class for all containers. ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "container, pack" date: "$Date: 2015-06-25 15:41:43 -0700 (Thu, 25 Jun 2015) $" revision: "$Revision: 97568 $"
deferred class ../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER
inherit ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET redefine ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state end
../interface/ev_pixmapable.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE rename ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xml#f_set_pixmapset_pixmap as ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xml#f_set_pixmapset_background_pixmap, ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xml#f_remove_pixmapremove_pixmap as ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xml#f_remove_pixmapremove_background_pixmap, ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xml#f_pixmappixmap as ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_background_pixmapbackground_pixmap redefine ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state, ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_background_pixmapbackground_pixmap end
FalseBOX [../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET] export {NONE} ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_changeable_comparison_criterionChangeable_comparison_criterion, Falsecompare_references, Falsecompare_objects, Falseobject_comparison {../interface/ev_any_handler.xmlEV_ANY_HANDLER} ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create undefine ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_copycopy redefine ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_changeable_comparison_criterionChangeable_comparison_criterion end
FalseCOLLECTION [../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET] rename Falseextend as ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_extendcl_extend, Falseput as ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_putcl_put, Falseprune as ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_prunecl_prune export {NONE} ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_changeable_comparison_criterionChangeable_comparison_criterion, Falsecompare_references, Falsecompare_objects, Falseobject_comparison {../interface/ev_any_handler.xmlEV_ANY_HANDLER} ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create undefine ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_copycopy redefine ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_changeable_comparison_criterionChangeable_comparison_criterion end
feature -- Access
f_item../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET -- Current item. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed readable: ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_readablereadable do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_interface_iteminterface_item ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_interface_iteminterface_item end
f_count../interface/ev_container.xml#f_countcount: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Number of elements in Current. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed deferred end
f_has_recursive../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_recursivehas_recursive (an_item: like ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does structure include an_item or -- does any structure recursively included by structure, -- include an_item. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed local l: FalseLINEAR [../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET] cs: detachable FalseCURSOR_STRUCTURE [../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET] c: detachable FalseCURSOR ct: detachable ../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER do Result := Falsehas (an_item) l := Falselinear_representation cs ?= l if cs /= Void then c := cs.Falsecursor end from l.Falsestart until l.Falseoff or Result loop ct ?= l.Falseitem if ct /= Void then Result := ct.../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_recursivehas_recursive (an_item) end l.Falseforth end if cs /= Void and then c /= Void then cs.Falsego_to (c) end end
f_background_pixmap../interface/ev_container.xml#f_background_pixmapbackground_pixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Result is pixmap displayed on background of Current. -- It is tessellated and fills whole of Current. do Result := ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xml#f_pixmapPrecursor {../interface/ev_pixmapable.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE} end
feature -- Status setting
f_merge_radio_button_groups../interface/ev_container.xml#f_merge_radio_button_groupsmerge_radio_button_groups (other: ../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER) -- Merge Current radio button group with that of other. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed other_not_void: other /= Void do ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_merge_radio_button_groupsmerge_radio_button_groups (other) end
f_unmerge_radio_button_groups../interface/ev_container.xml#f_unmerge_radio_button_groupsunmerge_radio_button_groups (other: ../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER) -- Remove other from radio button group of Current. -- If no radio button of other was checked before removal -- then first radio button contained will be checked. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed other_is_merged: attached ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_merged_radio_button_groupsmerged_radio_button_groups as l_merged_r_b_groups and then ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_unmerge_radio_button_groupsunmerge_radio_button_groups (other) ensure other_not_merged: old other.../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_selected_radio_buttonhas_selected_radio_button and old other.../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_radio_buttonhas_radio_button implies other_first_radio_button_now_selected: not old ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_selected_radio_buttonhas_selected_radio_button and old other.../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_radio_buttonhas_radio_button and (attached old ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_merged_radio_button_groupsmerged_radio_button_groups as l_merged_r_b_groups and then l_merged_r_b_groups.Falsecount = 1) and ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_radio_buttonhas_radio_button implies ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_first_radio_button_selectedfirst_radio_button_selected other_original_radio_button_still_selected: old other.../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_selected_radio_buttonhas_selected_radio_button implies other.../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_selected_radio_buttonhas_selected_radio_button end

f_merged_radio_button_groups../interface/ev_container.xml#f_merged_radio_button_groupsmerged_radio_button_groups: detachable FalseARRAYED_LIST [../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER] -- Result is all other radio button groups -- merged with Current. Void if no other containers -- are merged. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_merged_radio_button_groupsmerged_radio_button_groups ensure not_is_empty: Result /= Void implies not Result.Falseis_empty end
f_writable../interface/ev_container.xml#f_writablewritable: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there a current item that may be modified? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed deferred end
f_readable../interface/ev_container.xml#f_readablereadable: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there a current item that may be accessed? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed deferred end

f_extend../interface/ev_container.xml#f_extendextend (v: like ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem) -- Ensure that structure includes v. -- Do not move cursor. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed extendible: Falseextendible v_not_void: v /= Void v_parent_void: v.../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent = Void v_not_current: v /= Current v_not_parent_of_current: not ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_is_parent_recursiveis_parent_recursive (v) v_containable: ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_may_containmay_contain (v) do ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_extendextend (v) ensure has_v: Falsehas (v) end

feature -- Measurement
f_client_width../interface/ev_container.xml#f_client_widthclient_width: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Width of the area available to children in pixels. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_client_widthclient_width ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_client_widthclient_width end
f_client_height../interface/ev_container.xml#f_client_heightclient_height: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Height of the area available to children in pixels. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_client_heightclient_height ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_client_heightclient_height end
feature -- Basic operations
f_propagate_foreground_color../interface/ev_container.xml#f_propagate_foreground_colorpropagate_foreground_color -- Propagate ../interface/ev_colorizable.xml#f_foreground_colorforeground_color recursively, to all children. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_propagate_foreground_colorpropagate_foreground_color ensure foreground_color_propagated: ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_foreground_color_propagatedforeground_color_propagated end
f_propagate_background_color../interface/ev_container.xml#f_propagate_background_colorpropagate_background_color -- Propagate ../interface/ev_colorizable.xml#f_background_colorbackground_color recursively, to all children. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_propagate_background_colorpropagate_background_color ensure background_color_propagated: ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_background_color_propagatedbackground_color_propagated end
feature {../interface/ev_container.xmlEV_CONTAINER, ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xmlEV_CONTAINER_I} -- Contract support
f_parent_of_items_is_current../interface/ev_container.xml#f_parent_of_items_is_currentparent_of_items_is_current: FalseBOOLEAN -- Do all items have parent Current? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_parent_of_items_is_currentparent_of_items_is_current end
f_items_unique../interface/ev_container.xml#f_items_uniqueitems_unique: FalseBOOLEAN -- Are all items unique? -- (ie Are there no duplicates?) require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_items_uniqueitems_unique end
f_foreground_color_propagated../interface/ev_container.xml#f_foreground_color_propagatedforeground_color_propagated: FalseBOOLEAN -- Do all children have same foreground color as Current? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_foreground_color_propagatedforeground_color_propagated end
f_background_color_propagated../interface/ev_container.xml#f_background_color_propagatedbackground_color_propagated: FalseBOOLEAN -- Do all children have same background color as Current? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_background_color_propagatedbackground_color_propagated end
f_all_radio_buttons_connected../interface/ev_container.xml#f_all_radio_buttons_connectedall_radio_buttons_connected: FalseBOOLEAN -- Are all radio buttons in this container connected? require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_all_radio_buttons_connectedall_radio_buttons_connected end
f_first_radio_button_selected../interface/ev_container.xml#f_first_radio_button_selectedfirst_radio_button_selected: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is first radio button contained in Current, -- selected? do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_first_radio_button_selectedfirst_radio_button_selected end
f_has_selected_radio_button../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_selected_radio_buttonhas_selected_radio_button: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current contain a selected radio button? do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_has_selected_radio_buttonhas_selected_radio_button end
f_has_radio_button../interface/ev_container.xml#f_has_radio_buttonhas_radio_button: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current contain one or more radio buttons? do Result := ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xml#f_has_radio_buttonhas_radio_button end
feature {NONE} -- Contract support
f_is_in_default_state../interface/ev_container.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in its default state? do Result := ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET} and ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_pixmapable.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE} end
feature -- Contract support
f_is_parent_recursive../interface/ev_container.xml#f_is_parent_recursiveis_parent_recursive (a_widget: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is a_widget ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent, or recursivly, ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent of ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := attached ../interface/ev_widget.xml#f_parentparent as l_parent and then (l_parent = a_widget or else l_parent.../interface/ev_container.xml#f_is_parent_recursiveis_parent_recursive (a_widget)) end
f_may_contain../interface/ev_container.xml#f_may_containmay_contain (v: ../interface/ev_widget.xmlEV_WIDGET): FalseBOOLEAN -- May v be inserted in Current. -- Instances of EV_WINDOW may not be inserted -- in a container even though they are widgets. local l_window: detachable ../interface/ev_window.xmlEV_WINDOW do l_window ?= v Result := l_window = Void end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_container.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_container_i.xmlEV_CONTAINER_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_changeable_comparison_criterion../interface/ev_container.xml#f_changeable_comparison_criterionChangeable_comparison_criterion: FalseBOOLEAN = False -- May Falseobject_comparison be changed? -- (Answer: no by default.)
f_cl_put../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_putcl_put (v: like ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem) -- Replace ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem with v. do ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_putput (v) end
f_cl_extend../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_extendcl_extend (v: like ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem) -- Ensure that structure includes v. do ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_extendextend (v) end
f_cl_prune../interface/ev_container.xml#f_cl_prunecl_prune (v: like ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_itemitem) -- Remove one occurrence of v if any. -- (Reference or object equality, -- based on Falseobject_comparison.) do ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_pruneprune (v) end
invariant client_width_non_negative: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_client_widthclient_width >= 0 client_width_within_limit: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_client_widthclient_width <= ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth client_height_non_negative: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_client_heightclient_height >= 0 client_height_within_limit: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_client_heightclient_height <= ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight all_radio_buttons_connected: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_all_radio_buttons_connectedall_radio_buttons_connected parent_of_items_is_current: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_parent_of_items_is_currentparent_of_items_is_current items_unique: ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies ../interface/ev_container.xml#f_items_uniqueitems_unique
